thread.title: Spartak Moscow defender Dmitri Kombarov hires LION for his five-year-old daughter's birthday party
thread.title_full: Spartak Moscow defender Dmitri Kombarov hires LION for his five-year-old daughter's birthday party

author: Joe Mewis
title: Spartak Moscow defender Dmitri Kombarov hires LION for his five-year-old daughter's birthday party
text:
Kombarov posted the pictures on social media (Photo: CEN/Instagram) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
When it comes to children's birthday parties, it's normal to bring in some hired help. 
An entertainer, perhaps, to keep the little ones amused. Or maybe someone in the kitchen, as those jellies won't set themselves. 
But Spartak Moscow defender Dmitri Kombarov threw all conventional logic out of the window in renting a lion for his five-year-old daughter. 
Yup, the king of the jungle and one of nature's most feared killing machines. 
Admittedly it was only a cub and Kombarov's daughter Ulyana was able to pose for snaps on social media playing happily with the little big cat. Ulyana and her birthday present (Photo: CEN/@dmitrykombarov) 
Kombarov said on Instagram: "My beloved daughter, today is your fifth anniversary. Your mother and I love you more than life." 
The renting of big cats has become a status symbol for the Russian elite, with the going rate to hire them for parties is about 10,000 RUB (Â£139) for an hour. 
But Kombarov's gesture has drawn criticism on social media with people suggesting that the cub looked like it had been drugged. Kombarov starred for Russia in Euro 2016 (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
Animal rights activists are opposed to the practice. 
Komvarov began his career with Dynamo Moscow alongside his twin brother Kirill, who is now at Russian Premier League side Arsenal Tula. 
Dmitri plays primarily as a left-back and has 41 caps for Russia , turning out for country at last summer's Euro 2016. poll loading Would you get your child a lion for their birthday? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
